Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (For someone who always boasts about his high-class status.)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (His clothes are very %messy% .)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Sir, may I ask if anything happened to your clothes?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Sir, are you feeling uncomfortable at the moment?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (It might be risky to ask.)

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Huh?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Why on earth do you want to know?

Choices.Choice1: I want to assure your convenience

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I want to assure you're feeling comfortable during your trip here.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Just my curiosity getting the best of me, sir.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Nice to know you care,
Speaker.line2: but it was just a %business% %matter% of mine.
Which clearly, has nothing to do with you.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: What on earth are you talking about?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: Ohh, are you referring to my outfit?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: What's with the staring, huh?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: Ohh, I get it.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: It's none of your business to know!

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Then I must apologize, sir.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Ugh, fine.
Speaker.line2: If you're that interested in poking your nose into other people's affairs.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: It was just a %business% %matter% of mine.
Speaker.line2: Which I do not give a single care.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Once I arrive home, I'll simply toss this mess of a suit to my maid,
Speaker.line2: and they'll take care of everything.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: So keep that stare to your own self!
